name: Little Ed's Junior Gym Doctor
description:
Gym is the perfect place to get the proper fitness tips to keep our body more beautiful & more shining. In this Little ED's junior gym doctor game you can perform tons of gyming exercises like boxing, weightlifting, dumbbells, starching balls, cardio exercise, cycling, Shoulder Starching, push-ups and much more. After exercise little kid gets some injury and he needs some medical treatment. During medical treatment use different types of medical tools like injection, medicine, x-ray machine and much more. By playing this game, kids get some knowledge about fitness tips and medical treatment to recover from injury during exercise.

Features
- Workout on different types of equipment
- Use different medical tools
- Try different exercises
- Fun and educational game
- Play and enjoy gym game
